passage_text: You may notice that many health care professionals do not list their fees. I value transparency and would like prospective clients to know what to expect in terms of expenses for psychological services. The recommended fee for psychological services (per BC Psychological Association) is $200.00 per hour. My fee for most psychological services is $190.00 per hour. Payment is by cash or cheque (not credit cards) and is due at the end of each session.

Recommended Fee* for Psychological Services The recommended fee until 30 June 2016 for a standard psychological consultation of 45-60 minutes is $238.00 This fee is recommended only. Psychologists are able to vary this fee at their discretion.

* These item numbers are not to be confused with the Medicare Benefits Schedule (MBS) item numbers** Recommended fees do not include GST (where applicable) APS 2014-2015 Schedule of recommended fees and item numbers for psychological services 1 July 2014 to 30 June 2015 Disclaimer: These fees are recommended only.

Hourly Fees: Our fees are set in accordance with the guidelines put forth by the Ontario Psychological Association (OPA). However, my fees for services are considerably lower than those recommended by OPA.

Fees for Clinical Psychology registrars are $155. This is considerably lower than the Australian Psychological Society’s recommended fees for private practice psychological services at $235 per 50 minute session. Please note that fees are payable at the time of consultation.
